This document contains all the rough work involved in the cleaning up of data 

```{r}
unique(Tidy_Term$Year)

Tidy_Term %>% 
  arrange(Year)
```

```{r}
Tidy_Term %>%
  arrange(Year) %>%
  slice(1000:1628)
```



```{r}

))
```

```{r}
unique(Tidy_Time$Year)
```
```{r}
Tidy_Time %>%
```
